eu.genomic.resources.biom2ld

Class Engine

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.genomic.resources.biom2ld.Engine

  • public class Engine
extends java.lang.Object
    This engine is able to convert a BIOM file, codified in HDF5 format, to RDF
    Version:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Mikel Ega√±a Aranguren

    • Constructor Detail

      • Engine

        public Engine(java.lang.String HDF5FilePath,
      java.lang.String biom_ontology_path,
      java.lang.String biom_table,
      java.lang.String output)
        Parameters:
        HDF5FilePath - the path for the HDF5 file
        biom_ontology_path - the path to the BIOM ontology (e.g. ontology/biom.owl)
        biom_table - the URI of the instance that will represent the BIOM table (e.g. http://genomic-resources.eu/biom_table_1): everything hangs from thie instance
        output - the path for the RDF dump
